long_description: Strap the ProRack Trunk Carrier 2-Bike trunk rack onto the trunk or rear hatch of your car, and you'll have a quick, easy and affordable way to take up to 2 bikes along with you for the ride. Easy-to-use, adjustable hub system lets you quickly adjust the 6-strap system for a secure fit; straps are made of high-strength nylon. Padded foam feet won't slide around on your car, protecting the paint and offering a solid, reliable fit. Anti-sway cradles keep bikes from moving around; rubber straps secure over bike top tubes. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: Strap the ProRack Trunk Carrier 2-Bike trunk rack onto the trunk or rear hatch of your car, and you'll have a quick, easy and affordable way to take up to 2 bikes along with you for the ride.
